```{r setup}
library(mikenguyen)
```


```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```
Without AMA theme

```{r}
 ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = mpg, y = wt, color = factor(cyl))) +
    geom_point() +
    ggtitle("Scatter Plot of MPG vs. Weight") +
    xlab("Miles per Gallon (MPG)") +
    ylab("Weight (1000 lbs)")
```

With AMA theme

```{r}
 ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = mpg, y = wt, color = factor(cyl))) +
    geom_point() +
    ggtitle("Scatter Plot of MPG vs. Weight") +
    xlab("Miles per Gallon (MPG)") +
    ylab("Weight (1000 lbs)") +
    amatheme()
```
